profile.title: Two controls from AC, with parameters on subcontrols

set-param.desc: [whoever is responsible for caring for the cats] - organization-defined duties ofindividuals
set-param.value: CAT PERSON #1 (primary), CAT PERSON #2 (asst), FURTHER CAT PERSONS

set-param.desc: [wherever the cat/s need/s to get to on a regular basis ] - organization-definedsecurity functions (deployed in hardware, software, and firmware) and security-relevantinformation
set-param.value: CAT FOOD STATION; LITTER BOX; REGULAR ACCESS TO OUTDOORS

set-param.desc: [describe feeding routine] - organization-defined security functions orsecurity-relevant information
set-param.value: REGULAR FEEDINGS AND PROVISION OF TREATS

set-param.desc: [whatever activities occur over networks] - organization-defined privilegedcommands
set-param.value: COMMUNICATIVE BEHAVIORS SUCH AS RUBBING LEGS

set-param.desc: [such occasions as network access may occur] - organization-defined compellingoperational needs
FOREMENTIONED PET CARETAKERS AND STAFF - organization-defined personnel orroles
PET CARETAKERS - organization-defined roles or classes of users
